comment.author: 16333811@N00
comment._content: This photo really shows how different it is today from then, particularly due to the view of the bridge.

comment.author: 34586311@N05
comment._content: It's interesting that you mention the bridge: I read something when researching for the launch of these photos that the people who lived in the area wondered why the bridge (I think it was this bridge) was built so high above the river -- of course when the area was flooded it didn't seem so high...
